abstract: Yahoo Chief Executive Carol Bartz, presiding over the company’s first shareholder meeting since her hiring, made it clear she didn’t want to hear any questions about Microsoft.
snippet: Yahoo Chief Executive Carol Bartz, presiding over the company’s first shareholder meeting since her hiring, made it clear she didn’t want to hear any questions about Microsoft.
lead_paragraph: Carol Bartz, the chief executive of Yahoo, presiding over the first shareholder meeting since her hiring, made it clear she didn’t want to hear any questions about Microsoft, whose convoluted courtship of Yahoo began while Terry Semel was still chief in 2007 and intensified while company co-founder Jerry Yang was in charge last year.

headline.main: Yahoo’s Chief Stays Mum on Microsoft Deal
